name: ULTIMA Token
description:
ULTIMA is the core of the Ultima Wish vault system. It is a Solana token that secures user assets, powers beneficiary distribution, and facilitates payment for vault operations. Features include:
- Integration with vaults for storing last wishes (text, audio, video, images).
- Payment mechanism for subscriptions in both SOL and USDC.
- Governance and voting rights for project enhancements.
- Direct staking capabilities with 7% APY rewards.
- Total supply: 250,000,000.
